_header: To the fiend of hell I am betaught
_description: Exclamation of a damned soul — three couplets

Lam78.Transcription:
To the fend of helle I am be tawthhwan cryst me clepyd ne herd I hym
                    nawthWyth fendys I schal to helle wendedere to dwelle wyth owte
                    endeDowrh foule sennys I am i loreA corsyd be that tyme that I was
                    bore
